paper_abstract: In this paper, control algorithms are presented for formation keeping and path following for non-holonomic platforms. The controls are based on feedback from onboard directional range sensors, and a switching Kalman filter is introduced for active sensing. Stability is analyzed theoretically and robustness is demonstrated in experiments and simulations. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Robust formation control and servoing using switching range sensors
